      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.net.URL createLocalCopy(Scope scope, long projectId, java.net.URL url, boolean time)
      This method copies the file pointed by the remote URL locally to the server Since this method essentially creates a temporary file in the server that will need to be cleared we have additional information to define the scope and the id of the project

        public static java.net.URL createLocalCopy(Scope scope,
                                           long projectId,
                                           java.net.URL url,

        This method copies the file pointed by the remote URL locally to the server Since this method essentially creates a temporary file in the server that will need to be cleared we have additional information to define the scope and the id of the project
